title: Zooming
description: Zooming the Power Query Editor Window
contents:
A tip that is often forgotten about is how to zoom in and out when
using the Power Query Editor. The text showing the data table can appear
small to those with visual difficulties. Even for those without
difficulties, the size of the text can prove problematic at times.
To increase the size of the text shown in the editor window, use the
key combinations of
CTRL SHIFT + to zoom in
CTRL SHIFT - to zoom out

title: Welcome to GFC Learning
description: Welcome to my blog, GFC Learning.
contents:
Excel question?
Problems with Power Query?
Here I will try to answer some of the more obscure questions you may
have about using MS Excel and Power Query, PowerPivot, DAX and using the
Excel Data Model and throw some Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) into
the mix.



I have also recently been learning the programming language
R. There will also be posts using R showing
how I have been using it for data transformations and data
visulisations.

This website was built completely in R using the distill
package. Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical
writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
